text: In the Private Key input box, Does it contain the following two sentences: -----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY----- and -----END PRIVATE KEY----- <@U07A2SN2X4K>
I'd assume so, but I'm not familiar with the dashboard. Try with it, and if that's still an issue, <@U07ARLLF39N> might know :fingerscrossed:
Hi <@U07DB91P073> - I can confirm that while perhaps not technically necessary, those two sentences _are_ expected at the beginning and end of the key blob
Can you add a api to get the number of unread messages?
